org.harctoolbox.harchardware.ir

Interface IIrReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, IHarcHardware
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICapture, IReceive
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandFusion, DevLirc, GirsClient, GlobalCache, IrDummy, IRrecvDumpV2, IrToy, IrWidget, LircMode2

    public interface IIrReader
extends IHarcHardware
    This interface contains the common parts between capturers and receivers.
